name: Bloom
description:
Bloom is a Total Conversion FPS compatible with GZDoom and Zandronum. The project is inspired by Blood and Doom classic shooters, merging the two storylines in a complex universe, where the player need to fight Hell and Cabal forces. The game includes 2 player classes to choose (Doomguy and Caleb) and new weapons.

â€‹Bloom also includes a complete new bestiary with more than 30 new hybrid monsters!

It can be played with all the original IWADs -Doom, Doom II, The Ultimate Doom, Final Doom, Sigil- and any vanilla map, changing the gameplay substantially.

Welcome to The Void between worlds, where the Cabal is trying to bring back Tchernobog!
